message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you today at a price of $20,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you, and this is a fair starting point for our negotiation. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me in the middle?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $12,000 is significantly below its true value.  How about we meet closer to the middle at $17,000? This offer reflects the value this product brings.
I understand your perspective, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
